message.body: So you can't call antonioni a French new wave director cause he's not French... What do you call him then? Just new wave? Writing this thing.
Influenced by that and French new wave
I guess influenced by in that he was kind if working against it. I love morning film talk!
(1/2) I'm writing about this book called the flamethrowers (which is great) and it totally has all the jump cuts and weird moments of deliberate reality
(2/2) stretching and blah blah blah but my cinema vocabulary is pretty limited.
So if I were to lump him in with Fellini and the French new wave big guns, what is that? Mid century European art house film?
No, been out for about a year. Saw the author read at the library last night.
It's a big deal. Would probably still be displayed prominently.

Most euro film was art house in the 60s but was ALL fighting tHollywood model. Most people Talk about cinema According to decade and country ie early 50s South American melodrama but I think if you are Covering a lot of time and countries that makes more sense
Ok great. Thanks for your help.
